---
title: "Current Forecast"
execute:
  echo: false
---

This is the current (disease_name) forecast using epiworldR.
Updated weekly.

## Example Model Summary
```{r}
library(epiworldR)
model_sir <- ModelSIRCONN(
  name              = "COVID-19",
  n                 = 50000,
  prevalence        = 0.0001,
  contact_rate      = 2,
  transmission_rate = 0.5,
  recovery_rate     = 1 / 3
)

# Printing Model Summary
summary(model_sir)
```
